Benefits

The range on all bolster, confuse, and captivate Speechcraft checks are doubled, and on a successful Speechcraft check to confuse, captivate, bolster, or intimidate, the effectâ€™s duration is doubled.
system.summary: Double duration and range on speech craft effects
